nowplayinginfotest.cpp

00001 #include <unittest++/UnitTest++.h>
00002 
00003 #include "lastfmlib/nowplayinginfo.h"
00004 
00005 #include <iostream>
00006 
00007 using std::string;
00008 
00009 SUITE(NowPlaingInfoTest)
00010 {
00011     TEST(TestgetPostDataUtf8)
00012     {
00013         NowPlayingInfo info("The Artist", "Trackname");
00014         info.setAlbum("An Album");
00015         info.setTrackLength(42);
00016         info.setTrackNr(4);
00017 
00018         CHECK_EQUAL(string("&a=The+Artist&t=Trackname&b=An+Album&l=42&n=4&m="), info.getPostData());
00019 
00020         info.setMusicBrainzId("31e7b30b-f960-408f-908b-c8e277308eab");
00021         CHECK_EQUAL(string("&a=The+Artist&t=Trackname&b=An+Album&l=42&n=4&m=31e7b30b-f960-408f-908b-c8e277308eab"), info.getPostData());
00022     }
00023     
00024     TEST(TestgetPostDataWidechar)
00025     {
00026         NowPlayingInfo info(L"The Artist", L"Trackname");
00027         info.setAlbum(L"An Album");
00028         info.setTrackLength(42);
00029         info.setTrackNr(4);
00030 
00031         CHECK_EQUAL(string("&a=The+Artist&t=Trackname&b=An+Album&l=42&n=4&m="), info.getPostData());
00032 
00033         info.setMusicBrainzId(L"31e7b30b-f960-408f-908b-c8e277308eab");
00034         CHECK_EQUAL(string("&a=The+Artist&t=Trackname&b=An+Album&l=42&n=4&m=31e7b30b-f960-408f-908b-c8e277308eab"), info.getPostData());
00035     }
00036 }
